name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, Appellee v. D. Bruce HANES, in his Capacity as the Clerk of the Orphans' Court of Montgomery County, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth, Department of Health v. Hanes

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, Appellee v. D. Bruce HANES, in his Capacity as the Clerk of the Orphans’ Court of Montgomery County, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of December, 2015, the parties’ Joint Application to Discontinue Appeal Pursuant to Pa.R.A. 1973(a) is GRANTED. The Motion to Present Oral Argument filed by James D. Schneller, pro se, is DISMISSED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
128 A.3d 1183
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, Appellee v. D. Bruce HANES, in his Capacity as the Clerk of the Orphans’ Court of Montgomery County, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 16, 2015.
